question: 4. What types of expenses are reimbursable?
answer:
Employees may claim reimbursement for the following expense categories:

• Travel (Local Conveyance): ₹3,000 per month
• Travel (Outstation – Bus/Train): Actuals (Economy class)
• Travel (Flight): Actuals (Economy class, prior approval required)
• Food & Meals: ₹500 per day
• Accommodation: ₹2,500 per night
• Mobile / Internet: ₹1,000 per month
• Client Entertainment: ₹3,000 per event
• Office Supplies: Actuals (approval required)
• Training & Certification: Actuals (HR approval required)
